prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that resembles an insect with metallic features and sharp mandibles.
I want a creature that has a sleek, armored body with red eyes and a segmented form.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the qualities of a small but fierce insect warrior.
Make a design for a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a tough exterior.
Imagine a tiny creature that can blend into its surroundings with stealthy movements.
Design a Pokemon that showcases a combination of industrial and natural elements.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that is both resilient and strategic in combat.
